title: Fishing Planet: Krampus Catcher Pack
description: The right combination of rods and reels will help you to return the things stolen by the elderly villains back to Santa! The kit contains an excellent assortment of festive season feeders, delicious baits for sweet-toothed fish, a keepnet and, naturally, a celebratory firework!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Krampus Catcher Pack
<!--text-->
To save Christmas from the havoc created by the old Krampuses, you will require a special set of treats and tackle! A whole team of the best elf engineers has worked with their magic tools and homemade goods to come up with this top-notch kit for your Christmas fishing adventure. The right combination of rods and reels will help you to return the things stolen by the elderly villains back to Santa! The kit also contains an excellent assortment of festive season feeders, delicious baits for sweet-toothed fish, a keepnet and, naturally, a celebratory firework!
We have also added to the kit a week-long Advanced Licenses and Pond Passes for Florida (Everglades), Germany (Sander Baggersee) and Peru (Maku-Maku Lake)! 

Merry Christmas and a fantastic New Year! 

Krampus Сatcher Pack includes:
* 40000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAY PREMIUM
* 25 Slots
* 3 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* MagFin™ KrampusHorn™ 7' 3" - Length: 7' 3"(2.0 m); Lure Weight: 3/8-1 3/7 Oz(10–40 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7.5–23 Lb(3–10 kg); Action: Fast 
* UL-CHUBER™ Fruitcake™ 12' 2" - Length: 12' 2"(3.7 m); Casting Weight: 5/7 – 2 1/2 Oz (20–70 g); Power: Medium; Line Weight: 4.5–13 Lb(2–6 kg); Action: Mod-Fast
* Garry Scott™ ChocolateBar™ 11' 10" - Length: 11' 10"(3.6 m); Line Weight: 11–33 Lb (5–15 kg); Action: Mod Fast

Reels:
* MagFin™ HornReel™ 3500 - Ratio: 6.2; Recovery: 29.5"(85 cm); Capacity: Mono 12/120(0.3/120), Braid 20/160( 0.23/160); Max Drag: 23 Lb(10.0 kg); Brake: Magnetic & Centrifugal 
* UL-CHUBER™ SuccadeReel™ 4500 - Ratio: 5.5; Recovery: 36.5"(93 cm); Capacity: Mono 20/110(0.4/110), Braid 30/145(0.28/145); Max Drag: 13 Lb(5.9 kg); Drag: Front
* MagFin™ ChocoBoom™ 6500 - Ratio: 4.5; Recovery: 27.5"(70 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/130(Mono 0.5/130), Braid 30/215(0.28/215); Max Drag: 30.8 Lb(14.75 kg); Drag: Rear

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m)
Mono .02"(0.5 mm) - Test: 32 Lb (14.5 kg)
Braid .003"(0.15 mm) - Test: 13 Lb (6.0 kg)
Braid .008"(0.19 mm) - Test: 23 Lb (10.4 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .012 (0.3) (x10) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 11 Lb (5.5 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .012 (0.3) (x10) - Length: 1.64’ (0.5 m); Test: 11Lb (5.5 kg)
* Titanium Leader .011(0.28) (x10) - Length: 1.64’ (0.5 m); Test: 32 Lb (14.5 kg)
* Titanium Leader .011(0.28) (x10) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 32 Lb (14.5 kg)
* Hooks: #8, #6, #4, #10/0, #5/0, #10/0 (x10)
* Cage Feeders: Feeder Gingerbread House 1 3/4 Oz.(50 g) (x2)
* Wagglers: Waggler Christmas Treats
* Poppers: Popper Santa's Milk 1 1/3 Oz.(40 g), #7/0 (x2)
* Baits: Ginger Cookies, Buñuelos, Cookies with Milk, Turdilli, Stollen, Candy Cane (x100)
* Groundbaits: Mega Cookie Groundbait (x25)

EQUIPMENT
* Garry Scott™ FishFort S Plus Keepnet  - Max Single Fish Weight: 77 Lb (35 kg); Total Fish Weight: 264 Lb (120 kg)

EVENT ITEMS:
* Fireworks (x5): Fireshark Epic Rockets, Hellfish Arsonist Kit, Squid-pro-Quo Blaster Pack, 12 Monkeys Demolition Set
* Ice Coin (x25)

POND PASSES (7 days):
Everglades
Sander Baggersee Lake
Maku-Maku Lake

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced Florida License
Advanced Germany License
Advanced Peru License
